short_description: This building block performs automatic network construction using OmniPath and pypath.
long_description: This building block performs automatic network construction using OmniPath and pypath. This enables the generation of a Boolean model in MaBoSS format. It takes a list of genes of interest and returns either a simple network as a SIF file or a MaBoSS network as a BND and CFG files.

default.name: input_file
default.description: List of genes as a CSV file

default.name: output_bnd_file
default.description: BND file of the generated MaBoSS model

default.name: output_cfg_file
default.description: CFG file of the generated MaBoSS model
